import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Axios from "axios"; import { Row, Col, Nav } from "react-bootstrap"; import { BiChevronLeft, BiChevronsRight } from "react-icons/bi"; import Heading from "../Heading"; function EmployerApplication({ setshowSubContentClick }) { const [pendingNum, setPendingNum] = useState(0); const [shortlistedNum, setShortlistedNum] = useState(0); const [hiredNum, setHiredNum] = useState(0); const [rejectNum, setRejectNum] = useState(0); const [withdrewNum, setWithdrewNum] = useState(0); const [allApplicationNum, setAllApplicationNum] = useState(2); useEffect(() => { Axios.get( `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_DOMAIN}/dashboard/applicationNum`, { headers: { accessToken: localStorage.getItem("accessToken"), }, } ).then((response) => { setPendingNum(response.data[0][0].pendingNum); setRejectNum(response.data[1][0].rejectNum); setHiredNum(response.data[2][0].hiredNum); setShortlistedNum(response.data[3][0].shortlistedNum); setWithdrewNum(response.data[4][0].withdrewNum); // setWithdrewNum(response.data[4][0].withdrewNum); console.log(response.data); // setAllApplicationNum(response.data[5][0].allApplicationNum); }); }, []); return (

setshowSubContentClick(0)} className="me-2 d-block d-sm-none" >

All({allApplicationNum}) Pending({pendingNum}) Shortlisted({shortlistedNum}) Hired({hiredNum}) Rejected({rejectNum}) Withdrew({withdrewNum})
  • All (20)
  • Pending (15)
  • Shortlisted (1)
  • Hired (1)
  • Rejected (5)
  • Withdrew (1)

); } export default EmployerApplication;
